sentences.en: All these factors which underlie our success have been guaranteed in the Basic Law.
sentences.cn: 所有这些成功要素,在《基本法》内都一一得到了保障.

sentences.en: Concepts of objects in general underlie all empirical knowledge as its apriori condition.
sentences.cn: 一般而言的对象的概念就作为先天条件成为所有经验知识的基础.

sentences.en: Describe bipolar depression, and the theories that underlie its present treatment.
sentences.cn: 叙述双相抑郁症和现今治疗背后的理论.

sentences.en: Describe the neurochemical and behavioral processes that are thought to underlie the development of alcoholic dementia.
sentences.cn: 叙述形成酒瘾性痴呆症的神经化学和行为之过程.

sentences.en: Do Deeper Principles Underlie Quantum Uncertainty and Nonlocality?
sentences.cn: 在量子不确定性和非定域性的下面还有更深层的原理 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does some personal difficulty underlie his lack of interest in work?
sentences.cn: 是否有某种个人困难引致他对工作缺乏兴趣?

sentences.en: For Computer Scientists, research means searching to uncover the principles that underlie digital computation and communication.
sentences.cn: 对于计算机科学家, 研究意味着揭示数字计算和通讯之下的规律.

sentences.en: In area of deep frost penetration, sub - bases of clean, noncapillary materials often underlie the regular course.
sentences.cn: 在深冻地区公路施工中,人们通常在 基层 之下用干净的 、 不发生毛细作用的材料铺筑一层底基层.

sentences.en: The mechanisms that underlie induction, maintenance, termination of a tumor dormancy are of great clinical importance.
sentences.cn: 阐明诱导 、 维持和终止肿瘤休眠的机制具有重要的临床意义.

sentences.en: the one basic principle that underlies all of the party’s policies
sentences.cn: 贯穿该党各项政策的那一条基本原则

sentences.en: These doubts underlie the interpretations that we shall now discuss.
sentences.cn: 这些疑问正是我们所要讨论的分析实验结果的依据.

sentences.en: These ideas underlie much of his work.
sentences.cn: 他的作品大部分都是以这些主题思想为基础。

sentences.en: This rock type originates in the magma chambers that underlie volcanoes.
sentences.cn: 这种岩石源自火山底下的岩浆库.

trans.tran_en: to be the cause of something, or be the basic thing from which something develops

trans.tran_cn: 位于或存在于（某物）之下，构成…的基础（或起因），[经]构成优先于…的财政要求
